#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define mt make_tuple
#define LD long double
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 2*100005
#define bitcount _builtin_popcount
#define INF 2000000000
#define EPS 1e-9

template<typename T>T absll(T X)
{
    if(X<0)
        return -1*X;
    else
        return X;
}

LL modPow(LL A,LL B,LL C)
{
	LL X=1LL;
	while(B)
	{
		if(B&1)
		{
			X=(X*A)%C;
		}
		A=(A*A)%C;
		B/=2;
	}
	return X%C;
}

int main()
{
	vector<LL> cnt(17,0LL);
	vector<LL> pten(17,1LL);
	
	LL p=1;
	for(int i=1;i<16;i++)
	{
		cnt[i]=cnt[i-1]+9LL*p*i;
		pten[i-1]=p;
		p*=10;
	}
	pten[15]=p;
	pten[16]=p*10LL;
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		LL N,K;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&N,&K);
		int dig=0;
		
		while(K>cnt[dig]&&dig<16)
		{
			++dig;
		}
		
		K-=(cnt[dig-1]+1);
		N=K/dig+pten[dig-1];
		K=dig-(K%dig)-1;
		dig=0;
		while(dig<K)
		{
			N/=10LL;
			++dig;
		}
		
		N%=10;
		printf("%lld\n",N);
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
